metadata.title: CVE-2019-16236 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Dino before 2019-09-10 does not check roster push authorization inmodule/roster/module.vala.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dino-im - 0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1
dino-im-common - 0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dino-im package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1').
